description: From un- (prefix meaning ‘to do the opposite of, reverse (the action specified by the verb to which it is attached)’) +‎ forget.

verbs.description: unforget (third-person singular simple present unforgets, present participle unforgetting, simple past unforgot, past participle unforgotten)

entries.meaning: (transitive, informal) To not forget; also, to remember again after forgetting.
